# agent

The `Agent` class for LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/agent/index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/agent/index" symbolName="ContextResponse" /> ContextResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/agent/index" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/agent/index" symbolName="BaseAgent" /> BaseAgent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/agent/index" symbolName="Agent" /> Agent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.
